author: stevel
msg: added exclusion of tests we know which break. This lets us add tests into the system before we have a fix for them; you just have to run them individually for now.

author: stevel
msg: two tests sharing the same data set

author: sbailliez
msg: Use the normalized value rather than the %. Incidentally it fix a bug that shows
up because the number format in the xml is formatted using a locale dependent
format rather than a neutral dependent format like a float datatype in XML Schema
therefore it is not possible to use interoperate between different locales with the XML.
ie generate the XML using one locale and the xsl using another.
